usage: Instructions and transformation rules for converting .xsd schema files into Java JSON POJO classes.
description: Converts Tibco BusinessWorks XSD schema files to Java POJO classes for JSON serialization/deserialization with camelCase fields

class_generation.class_name: Derived from root element name (e.g. AcctDetails -> AcctDetails)

field_mapping.target: Private Java fields with camelCase naming
field_mapping.naming_convention: Convert XML element names to camelCase (e.g., CustomerID -> customerId, AcctNumber -> acctNumber)

validation_mapping.required_fields: Fields without minOccurs='0' must have @NotNull annotation
validation_mapping.length_restrictions: Map to @Size(min, max) annotations if applicable

input_example.content:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>

<xs:schema xmlns:xs="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"
  xmlns="http://www.tibco.com/schemas/TIBCO_BW_REST_EXAMPLE/Schemas/Schema.xsd"
  targetNamespace="http://www.tibco.com/schemas/TIBCO_BW_REST_EXAMPLE/Schemas/Schema.xsd"
  elementFormDefault="qualified"
  attributeFormDefault="unqualified">
  <xs:element name="AcctDetails">
    <xs:complexType>
      <xs:sequence>
        <xs:element name="RecordIndicator" type="xs:string"/>
        <xs:element name="CustomerID" type="xs:string"/>
        <xs:element name="AcctNumber" type="xs:string"/>
        <xs:element name="BranchID" type="xs:string" minOccurs="0"/>
        <xs:element name="StatusCode" type="xs:string" minOccurs="0"/>
        <xs:element name="RefNumber" type="xs:string" minOccurs="0"/>
        <xs:element name="ExchangeRate" type="xs:decimal" minOccurs="0"/>
        <xs:element name="Filler" type="xs:string" minOccurs="0"/>
      </xs:sequence>
    </xs:complexType>
  </xs:element>
</xs:schema>

key_elements.xs:element_root: Defines the main class name for JSON POJO
key_elements.xs:complexType: Indicates a complex object requiring class generation
key_elements.xs:sequence: Maps to ordered fields in the Java class
key_elements.xs:element_nested: Individual fields converted to camelCase naming
key_elements.minOccurs: Determines field nullability and validation annotations

special_considerations: minOccurs='0' fields are nullable, but others require @NotNull
xs:decimal maps to BigDecimal for precision in JSON
XML element names converted to camelCase (CustomerID -> customerId)
@JsonInclude(NON_NULL) prevents null fields in JSON output
Handle nested complexTypes as separate JSON POJO classes
